alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 2:00AM PST until March 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet above 2000 feet with 2 to 12 inches possible down to 1000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County including Interstate 5. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with road closures possible. Blowing snow will cause white-out conditions at times. Downed trees and tree limbs with power outages are possible due to heavy snow and gusty winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1000 to 2000 feet. Heaviest snow Saturday morning into the afternoon, and again late Saturday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
